content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/soimort/you-get.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image as a parent image
FROM python:3.9

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install required system dependencies
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y ffmpeg \
    && apt-get clean

# Install Python dependencies
RUN pip install .

# Run the tests
RUN python -m unittest discover -s tests
